events.description: (4:48) (Shotgun) 9-M.Stafford pass deep right to 15-G.Tate for 59 yards, TOUCHDOWN. With that touchdown pass Matthew Stafford has set a new franchise record for the most career touchdown passes in Lions history. Stafford, who has now thrown 119 career touchdowns, breaks a tie with Hall of Fame QB Bobby Layne for the all-time Lions record
